question:
You are having a graduation party next Saturday night. You have invited 50 people to celebrate at an outdoor barbecue evening, which may continue till late night.Write a letter to your elderly neighbour. In your letter:
explain what will be happening
offer your apologies in advance
invite him/her to visit your house someday
text: I am writing this missive to let you know that on 26th march 2022 i.e on Sunday I am going to throw a graduation party at my home and the event will start from 5:00 pm onwards and it may go up to 11:00 pm.Besides this,I have started decorating my garden as the gathering would be around 25-50 members.So the garden has ample space where we can gather together and enjoy our special day.Continental food has been arranged.Apart from this dj system has been set up for more fun.

Please accept my apologies in advance for the disturbance that may be caused to you for the music that would be played in our garden.Though,I will personally monitor the sound of the music and I will make sure that it may not went load.

I will be greatful if you join the moment along with Shivam.I have also invited Mr singh family.Furthermore my family will also be present in the party.Thus you will never feel bored as there are two families to accompany you.Please note the timings it will start from 5:00 pm onwards followed by dinner at 7:30 pm.
Give my regard to uncle and aunt
